version_description:
- Show traffic in google map view.
- Show Balance in Family Cards.

- Show traffic in google map view.
- Show Balance in Family Cards.
- Add video pop up to show application features after registration for one time.
- Add video pop up to show application features after registration for one time.

- Add fun game feature.
- Badge sharing url on the social media

- Add fun game feature.
- Badge sharing url on the social media

- Virtual Payments: now pay for your fuel using your mobile app directly.
- Remote Payments: Pay your friends and family fuel using OOMCO World.
- Virtual Basma: Get your fuel card online without the need for a physical card
- New ID icon: Find your OOMCO ID easier with the ID icon
- New Badges: Smart User and Smart Card
- Fixed minor issue.

- Virtual Payments: now pay for your fuel using your mobile app directly.
- Remote Payments: Pay your friends and family fuel using OOMCO World.
- Virtual Basma: Get your fuel card online without the need for a physical card
- New ID icon: Find your OOMCO ID easier with the ID icon
- New Badges: Smart User and Smart Card
- Fixed minor issue.

- Virtual Basma Plus Improvements
- Other bug fixes and enhancements

- Virtual Basma Plus Improvements
- Other bug fixes and enhancements
- Enabling multiple promo codes activation
- Enabling multiple promo codes activation

- New Digital Gift Vouchers of your favorite brands. Update your app and enjoy redemption like never before across all of Oman.

- New and improved “Rewards” section

- App inbox for inbound communications

- Miscellaneous bug fixes


OOMCO’s digital gift vouchers are just like regular physical gift cards offered by most retail stores. Through these vouchers, OOMCO now offers its valued customers a wide range of options to redeem their points for. Customers can redeem their points for Digital Gift Vouchers within the OOMCO World App. These gift vouchers can then be utilized against purchases at the outlets of the issuing partner mentioned on the voucher.

- New Digital Gift Vouchers of your favorite brands. Update your app and enjoy redemption like never before across all of Oman.

- New and improved “Rewards” section

- App inbox for inbound communications

- Miscellaneous bug fixes
